title: Simple warm potato salad recipe | Waitrose

instructions.step: Place the potatoes in a large pan of water, bring to the boil and simmer for 10 minutes until tender. Drain and leave to cool slightly.
Meanwhile, for the dressing, whisk together the mustard, vinegar, oil and sugar until well blended. Pour over the warm potatoes, tossing to coat.
Scatter over the celery, salad onions and chives and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with cress to serve.
